about_the_game:
Game Overview

Dive into the world of Decksplorers: Into the Shell, where deckbuilding card combat meets real-time action in a thrilling roguelite adventure! Master the art of strategic card play and swift reflexes where it not only matters which card you play but also where you play it. Explore as you venture into the mysterious ever-changing caves of "The shell". Uncover its secrets and try to find the legendary "Blank card" which will activate whatever is written on it.

Key Features

Real-Time Deckbuilding Action:
Experience the best of both worlds as you combine the strategic depth of deckbuilding with the adrenaline-pumping excitement of real-time combat. Make split-second decisions to unleash powerful card combinations and obliterate your enemies.

Roguelite Adventure
No two runs are the same! Navigate through procedurally generated levels filled with unique challenges, hidden treasures, and formidable foes. Adapt your strategy on the fly as you uncover new cards, relics, and abilities with each playthrough.

Diverse Card Collection
Build and customize your deck from a vast array of cards, each offering distinct abilities and synergies. Discover rare and powerful cards that can turn the tide of battle in your favor. Will you focus on offensive prowess, defensive fortitude, or cunning tactics?

Dynamic Combat
Engage in intense, fast-paced battles where every move counts. Dodge, block, and strike with precision, using your deck to unleash devastating combos and special attacks. Face off against a variety of enemies, each with their own unique behaviors and strategies.

Inspiring Influences
Fans of Slay the Spire, The Binding of Isaac, and Enter the Gungeon will feel right at home in Decksplorers: Into the Shell. We’ve taken inspiration from these classics to create a game that blends their best elements into an entirely new and exhilarating experience.

Endless Replayability
With an ever-expanding array of cards, enemies, and levels, no two runs will ever feel the same. Challenge yourself in this roguelite adventure and uncover new powerful combinations of cards and powerups to reach the end.

Join the Adventure
Prepare yourself for a deckbuilding journey like no other. Decksplorers: Into the Shell is ready to test your strategic mind and reflexes in a relentless pursuit of victory. Are you ready to delve into the shell and uncover its secrets?

Wishlist now and be the first to explore the unknown!
